sentences.en: As if the smell of disinfect solution spreading in the hospital forever.
sentences.cn: 就好象消毒水的味道,在那里永远弥漫着、发散着.

sentences.en: Chlorine is used to disinfect water.
Dab again with alcohol to disinfect the wound.
sentences.cn: 再次用酒精轻拍,防止伤口感染.

sentences.en: Disinfect the wound before you bandage it up.
sentences.cn: 伤口包扎之前应先消毒.

sentences.en: Disinfect the wound before you bandage it.
sentences.cn: 给伤口消毒,然后包扎起来.

sentences.en: First use some iodine to disinfect the wound.
Function: Remove comedo and dead cell , Oil control, Lavender disinfect & sterilize .
sentences.cn: 功效: 清除脸部的黑头、角质 、 控制油脂的分泌、收缩毛孔, 消毒 杀菌.

sentences.en: It can disinfect for food surface , and prevent polluted food surface.
sentences.cn: 为食品表面杀毒, 防止食品外部被细菌污染.

sentences.en: Plough deeply in 30cm, and insolate in the sun to disinfect.
sentences.cn: 深耕30厘米，曝晒日光消毒。

sentences.en: They burned barrels of tar in the street to disinfect the air.
sentences.cn: 他们在街道上燃烧柏油,以消毒空气.

sentences.en: They sent people to clean and disinfect the hospitals'sewers.
sentences.cn: 他们于是派人清洁并消毒医院的下水道.

sentences.en: Two health workers disinfect each car goes through the village.
sentences.cn: 防疫人员给每一辆进出村子的车子消毒.

sentences.en: Wash and disinfect all surfaces and utensils that have been in contact with the raw meat.
sentences.cn: 洗消所有与生肉接触过的表面和炊具.

sentences.en: We always had disinfect the vegetables in boiling water first.
sentences.cn: 我们总是先用沸水给蔬菜消毒.

sentences.en: We would disinfect the microphone for our guests.
sentences.cn: 我们会于顾客面前消毒咪高峰.

sentences.en: White and clean wall work station of spotless. Disinfect close exit.
sentences.cn: 雪白干净的墙壁.一尘不染的操作台. 消毒严密的安全门.

trans.tran_en: to clean something with a chemical that destroys  bacteria
